name: Debris
description: An atmospheric first-person narrative adventure set in a surreal seascape locked between ice and rock. Following an incident, you and a friend must find power, defeat strange and deadly creatures, and decipher what mysterious forces are attempting to prevent your escape. Escape together or die alone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.3GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 or higher and AMD R9 270X or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space
